abstract: According to an American who has lived in Iran since he assassinated a former member of the Shah's government in the Washington suburbs in 1980, an alleged Iranian plot to kill the Saudi ambassador in Washington "just makes no sense at all."
snippet: According to an American who has lived in Iran since he assassinated a former member of the Shah's government in the Washington suburbs in 1980, an alleged Iranian plot to kill the Saudi ambassador in Washington "just makes no sense at all."

headline.main: American Who Killed for Iran in 1980 Resurfaces to Comment on Alleged Plot
